title: MatureGamerGirlsClub
body:
Hey everyone,

I am looking for more female lol players to hang out with and play some games here and there.
My Club is new and I just startet to look for some members.
There are no Rules or requirements. Just add me in LOL  ( Summonername , Neferate )  and let me know that you would like to join.
I would like to have a nice , relaxed ,friendly and casual GamerCommunity.

Hope you gonna be a part of it :D


Neffy


(PS: males are welcome as well but no sexual harrasment etc, so don't get your hopes up. If you want to join just for fun, sure thing and let me know )
